thread.title: Dimitri Payet working on his fitness as wantaway West Ham star trains with the kids
thread.title_full: Dimitri Payet working on his fitness as wantaway West Ham star trains with the kids

author: Jacob Murtagh
title: Dimitri Payet working on his fitness as wantaway West Ham star trains with the kids
text:
Sport Dimitri Payet working on his fitness as wantaway West Ham star trains with the kids The Frenchman is desperate to leave the London Stadium and is willing to take a pay cut in a bid to return to his homeland Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Payet would take pay cut to move, says Julien Laurens Share this video Get   
Dimitri Payet is working on his fitness training with West Ham 's kids as he pushes for a move to Marseille. 
The wantaway Frenchman is desperate to leave the London Stadium and is willing to take a pay cut in a bid to return to his homeland. 
Payet has been given the cold shoulder by Hammers teammates, who no longer want him at the club after going on strike. 
The 29-year-old has been forced to train away from the first team's Rush Green base, and is keeping himself ticking over with Terry Westley's Under-23s at Chadwell Heath instead. Payet is being put through his paces by Terry Westley (Photo: Jim Bennett) Payet plays a pass during the session (Photo: Jim Bennett) The playmaker was joined in the session by former Hammer Matthew Upson (Photo: Jim Bennett) Payet takes a breather at Chadwell Heath on Wednesday (Photo: Jim Bennett) 
Payet, who is on Â£125,000-a-week at West Ham, claims that he wants to go to Marseille not because he is being greedy but for the sake of his family. 
He insists he wants to go to France for the sake of his marriage and also because he wants his three kids to grow up in France. Read More
